description: Objective: To enhance the functionality of the Odoo ERP system by customizing existing modules and developing new ones, aiming to streamline business processes and improve operational efficiency.

Key responsibilities:
  • Analyzing business requirements and translating them into technical specifications.
  • Customizing base Odoo modules (Sales, Purchase, Manufacturing, Inventory, PLM, Helpdesk, Document…) to meet specific business needs.
  • Developing new modules and features to extend the functionality of the Odoo ERP system.
  • Integrating Odoo with third-party applications like Shopify.
  • Conducting thorough testing and quality assurance to ensure seamless integration and functionality.
  • Providing technical support and training to end-users.

Modules developed and customized:
  1. After-Sale Service (from Sales module):
    • RMA Orders: Developed a Return Merchandise Authorization system to manage returns efficiently, track returned items, and process refunds or replacements.
    • Order Cancellation: Implemented a feature allowing customers to cancel orders under certain conditions, with automated workflows for approval and processing.
    • RTS Order (Return to Sender): Created a system for handling return-to-sender cases, managing logistics, and updating inventory accordingly.
    • Dropship Refund Order: Developed a module to handle refunds for dropship orders, integrating with suppliers and automating the refund process.
    • Chargeback Order: Implemented a chargeback management system to handle disputed transactions, track status, and automate communications with payment processors.
  2. Forecasting System (from Manufacturing, Purchasing, PLM modules) developed a comprehensive forecasting module that:
    • Pre-issues Manufacturing Orders (MOs) and upcoming RFQs.
    • Estimates production time and resource allocation for MOs.
    • Automatically Kick-of the PLM (ECOs).
    • Generates detailed annual and monthly sales reports.
    • Sends automated forecasting notifications dynamically based on real-time data.
  3. Helpdesk module:
    • Auto Generate Tickets: Enabled automatic ticket generation via website forms from Shopify and through email.
    • Customized Helpdesk Overview: Created a personalized Helpdesk dashboard with sections for My Tickets, My Outbound Tickets, and Team Tickets.
    • Knowledge Base Integration: Added a feature to convert completed tickets into knowledge base articles.
    • Internal Ticket Rating: Implemented a rating system for internal tickets with options for Awesome, Accept, and Reject.
    • Employee KPI Report: Developed a module to track and report on employee Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
    • Recurring Tickets and Workflows: Set up recurring tickets and workflows based on the type of inquiry to streamline repetitive tasks.
  4. Document module:
    • NFC Renewal Document Management: Created a workflow for managing NFC renewal documents, ensuring secure and efficient handling of sensitive information.

Challenges Faced:
  • Ensuring seamless integration between customized modules and existing Odoo functionalities.
  • Managing complex business requirements and translating them into efficient technical solutions.
  • Handling data migration and ensuring data integrity during the customization process.

Achievements/Results:
  • Successfully customized and deployed multiple Odoo modules, significantly improving business processes.
  • Enhanced customer satisfaction through efficient after-sale service and automated helpdesk operations.
  • Improved forecasting accuracy and production planning, leading to better resource management and cost savings.
  • Streamlined document management processes, ensuring compliance and security.
